item.g:title: Traverse jkt
item.g:description:
Training routine number 47: bicycle to the Indian Peaks, return and ride home, soak in hot tub, start planning number 48,"Traverse jkt - Training routine number 47: bicycle to the Indian Peaks; run as much as you can to Pawnee Pass; scramble up Shoshoni Peak; return and ride home; soak in hot tub; start planning number 48. Our lightweight and highly breathable Traverse keeps stride the entire way. The fast-drying 93% all-recycled polyester/7% spandex fabric with 4-way stretch has a Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish to protect against wet weather. Jacket features include: a mesh-lined, zip-through stand-up collar with zipper garage, a full-front zip with wind flap; elastic banded cuffs; a drawcord waist and hem; and a slight drop tail. With two zippered handwarmer pockets and a zippered pocket on the left bicep that has an MP3 cord pass-through. Reflective logos (front and back) and graphics at the cuffs keep you visible. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling Program.Details:
Fast drying stretch-woven polyester soft shell is durable and delivers 4-way mechanical stretch
Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish
Mesh-lined zip-through stand-up collar
Full zip with wind flap and zipper garage
Zippered handwarmer pockets and a zip pocket at left bicep with interior MP3 cord pass-through
Elastic banded cuffs; drawcord waist and hem
Slight drop tail; Reflective logos and graphics at cuffs front and backFabric: 4.7-oz 70-denier 93% all-recycled polyester/7% spandex with 4-way mechanical stretch and Deluge DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Recyclable through the Common Threads Recycling ProgramWeight: (285 g 9.9 oz)Made in Vietnam.
